title: La La Anthony works a VERY low-cut curve-clinging jumpsuit
text:
La La Anthony stepped out to turn some heads on Thursday evening while out for the QVC Presents 'FFANY Shoes on Sale' event.

The 40-year-old TV personality did her signature pose while smiling for the cameras wearing an all black sequin look for the occasion.

This will mark the 26th year of the event which raises millions of dollars for breast cancer research.

Stylish: La La Anthony stepped out to turn some heads on Thursday evening while out for the QVC Presents 'FFANY Shoes on Sale' event

Hello! The 40-year-old tv personality did her signature pose while smiling for the cameras wearing an all black sequin look for the occasion

Kim Kardashian's best friend - who also spoke at the event - wasted no time serving looks for the charity event wearing the sequin long sleeved romper with a dramatic v-neck line.

Her sleeves were a bit long and reached almost to her fingers and she had long pink nails to accentuate her nighttime look.

She wore a pair of black high heels and had her dark hair slicked back into a pony tail.

Speech: Kim Kardashian's best friend - who also spoke at the event - wasted no time serving looks for the charity event wearing the sequin long sleeved romper with a dramatic v-neck line

Details: Her sleeves were a bit long and reached almost to her fingers and she had long pink nails to accentuate her nighttime look

Over the summer rumors began to swirl that LaLa and her husband Carmelo Anthony were getting a divorce after the NBA star was spotted out with Sara Smiri during their marriage.

The couple kept a low profile and even were spotted out on a rare outing together back in July while out for sushi in Beverly Hills.

Carmelo denied that there was anything between him and the woman.

Looking good: She wore a pair of black high heels and had her dark hair slicked back into a pony tail

The power couple got married back in 2010 and both share their 12-year-old son, Kiyan.

While this isn't the first time the two have had rocky roads ahead, they split up briefly back in 2017 and got back together just a year later.

The two have yet to confirm nor deny they are getting a divorce.
description: La La Anthony stepped out to turn some heads on Thursday evening while out for the QVC Presents 'FFANY Shoes on Sale' event. The 40-year-old tv personality did her signature pose.
